message.body: help

fragments.text: help

message.body: @Jaspann Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). Typos work too!

fragments.text: @Jaspann Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). Typos work too!

message.body: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

fragments.text: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

message.body: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

fragments.text: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

message.body: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 95 inputs can be chained in a macro.

fragments.text: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 95 inputs can be chained in a macro.

message.body: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

fragments.text: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

fragments.text: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

message.body: help

fragments.text: help

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

message.body: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

fragments.text: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

fragments.text: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

message.body: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

fragments.text: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

message.body: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 95 inputs can be chained in a macro.

fragments.text: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 95 inputs can be chained in a macro.

message.body: @Jaspann Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). Typos work too!

fragments.text: @Jaspann Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). Typos work too!

message.body: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

fragments.text: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: You can learn how to save and execute saved macros (and more!) by using the command !savingmacroshelp.

fragments.text: You can learn how to save and execute saved macros (and more!) by using the command !savingmacroshelp.

fragments.text: @gameguy37 Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). Typos work too!

message.body: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

fragments.text: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

message.body: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

fragments.text: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

fragments.text: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. message.body: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 95 inputs can be chained in a macro.

message.body: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 4 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

message.body: !commands

fragments.text: !commands

message.body: @RoadToRalala Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). Typos work too!

fragments.text: @RoadToRalala Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). Typos work too!

message.body: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

fragments.text: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

message.body: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

fragments.text: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

message.body: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 95 inputs can be chained in a macro.

fragments.text: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 95 inputs can be chained in a macro.

message.body: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

fragments.text: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.
